description.message: Keep updated with the progress of your iDevice order

empty.description: Popup text where no orders exist.

freq_disabled.description: Text to represent disabled automatic update functionality.

notification.message: One or more orders have been updated!

opt_logger_help.message: $O_PARA$Follow these steps if you would like to view the logs;$C_PARA$$O_LIST$$O_ITEM$Bring up the extensions management page by clicking the wrench icon and choosing $O_BOLD$Tools > Extensions$C_BOLD$$C_ITEM$$O_ITEM$Ensure $O_BOLD$Developer mode$C_BOLD$ is checked in the top right of the page$C_ITEM$$O_ITEM$Expand the listing for $O_BOLD$iOrder$C_BOLD$ and click the $FILE$ link$C_ITEM$$O_ITEM$Select the $O_BOLD$Console$C_BOLD$ tab in the new $O_BOLD$Developer Tools$C_BOLD$ window$C_ITEM$$C_LIST$
opt_logger_help.description: Help text for the Logging section in the Developer Tools dialog on the Options page.
